hook: A tool at the heart of your import business
pitch: Accurate customs duties valuation and improved landed costs workflow for your imported goods, with unique features.

feature_matrix.name: HS Codes definition per Product or Product Category
New Split Method : Customs Duties by HS Code in inventory valuation
Manual CIF value update for each HS Code
Preview all transfered products in Landed Costs
Customs & Shipping Bills Generation from Landed Costs
Editable Customs Duties amounts per HS Code in Landed Costs (sometimes required to match customs bills)
Multiple vendor Bills per Landed Cost (with multiple currencies support)
Multi-company support : HS Codes configuration for Products and Categpries per company
Configuration option : Add 10% CIF in VAT, CESS LEVY and SSCL

benefits.title: 💲 Save weeks of implementation
benefits.description:
Customs duties calculation and landed costs valuation is a complex subject, Our tool helps you save lots of time and energy, so you don't have to spend forever planning and building stuff.
It's all set up and tested, ready to make your work easier

benefits.title: 🔍 Avoid mistakes in Landed Costs Valuation
benefits.description: Get rid of mistakes in figuring out Landed Costs!. Our tool helps you avoid mistakes in landed costs valuation, so you can be sure that you're always getting the right numbers.

benefits.title: 🕒 Save Time on Landed Costs
benefits.description: Our tool helps you save time on landed costs, so you can focus on what really matters: growing your business.

overview.title: Customs duties calculation, to save you time
overview.description: No need for tedious Excel Sheet formulas and macros, customs duties are calculated for each HS (Harmonized System) Code

overview.title: Improvements in the Landed Costs form, to make your life easier
overview.description:
You can attach as many vendor bills as you need. Typically useful for freight consolidation, when one freight forwarder imports all the products from multiple vendors.
 Details about related products from transfers are displayed as soon as they are selected.
 You can generate shipping bills with one click
overview.image_description: Freight Consolidation and Product details and Shipping Bills generation in Landed Costs form

overview.title: Easy Shipping Costs input, to improve your workflow
overview.description: No more tedious landed cost product definition, we defined all the common shipping costs and made them available directly in the form and tree view, for easier input and filtering
overview.image_description: Easy input of all shipping costs

setup.title: HS Codes setup (added by this module)
setup.description: This allows you to input various import rates and taxes. The feature is available in Inventory > Configuration > HS CodesTo enable customs duties calculation, the newHarmonized Code field should be defined either on Product or on Product Category hierarchy

setup.title: Related setup in standard Odoo Inventory Module
setup.description: For Landed Costs valuation to function properly, Product Categories need to have a Costing Method set on Average costs or FIFOFor foreign currencies to be enabled in Odoo, you need to enable it in Settings > Invoicing > Currencies Section > Multi Currencies
